snippet: Horse culture meets ski culture at the self-proclaimed world skijoring championships in Whitefish, Mont. The event touts itself as the “biggest party on snow.”
abstract: Horse culture meets ski culture at the self-proclaimed world skijoring championships in Whitefish, Mont; skier is pulled by horse over the snow in what is touted as 'biggest party on snow.'
lead_paragraph: Horse culture meets ski culture at the self-proclaimed world skijoring championships in Whitefish, Mont. The event touts itself as the “biggest party on snow.”
